content.rendered:
Congratulations to Bruce for his three Grammy nominations in Best Rock Performance and Best Rock Song for “We Take Care Of Our Own” and Best Rock Album for Wrecking Ball.

The Grammy Awards will air live on CBS on Sunday, February 10 at 8/7c.

excerpt.rendered: Congratulations to Bruce for his three Grammy nominations in Best Rock Performance and Best Rock Song for “We Take Care Of Our Own” and Best Rock Album for Wrecking Ball. The Grammy Awards will air live on CBS on Sunday, February 10 at 8/7c.
